== Installing Dojo
Download the "Dojo Toolkit" from http://dojotoolkit.org/"> http://dojotoolkit.org/ and extract the zip file. As of the time of writing this article the release of dojo is version 1.3.1. Rename the name directory to "dojoroot". Put this directory into a folder "web".
I recommend that you use the proposed folder names, this makes it easier to follow this tutorial.
